content:
/>
XIV.4.D.2.c
.
Payer Will Not Furnish Information
If a response is received that essentially states that the payer will not furnish the information requested, the verification requirement has been met.
Reference
:  For more information on the efforts to clarify disputed amounts, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.D.12
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
